cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 27th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 27th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Four bed dormitory, with two single beds and a set of bunks.  Sound proofed, heated and carpeted.  Spacious room near bathrooms.  Great fully equipped kitchen and games room with pool table, darts.  Free DVD hire and parking.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
4 bed ladies dorm.  Two single beds and a set of bunks, with linen.  Heated and soundproofed.  Close to ladies bathroom.  Fully equipped guest kitchen and large games room available.
Free WIFI, free pool table and darts, free DVD hire and free BBQ use.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Budget double with linen.  Share bathroom close to the room.  Garden view.  Fully equipped guest kitchen and large games room with free DVD hire, pool table and darts.  Off street parking.  TV room and Free WIFI.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

If you cancel after 23:59 27th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).
